answers.answer: Maybe you should call your midwife or doctor. I would had asked for answers before being discharged

I dint feel like I can be much bc only thing I can thing is iron pills. But you are so close to labor idk if itll be enough and quick enough :-( wise case is say you have ca good chance of ending up needing a blood transfusion. Definitely need to talk to doctor about asap. I suggest calling their office tomorrow first thing and see if you can get a, same day appt maybe.
I was already discharged couple hours ago. My doctor is kiaser so u just see on call. I cant see my regular doctor til tomorrow. The nurse was worried but the doctor wasnt n i dont understand.
Thank you and i do have some pills now. Im scared this isn't my first child but worst pregnancy.  Im only 24 and im scared
There should be an on call nurse. Don't worry about it. Im anemic as well I know it can be scary but try to drink some oj while taking iron pills.
Thank you and i will try im eating all iron food and taking pills abd drinking water and instant breakfast .
Im sure you will be fine...and you are so lucky to already be 3 cen. @ 36 weeks lol

question: Hi im 36w3d AND 3cm 50% efaced. Ok so ive had to false labors 27w and 35w. I wasnt feeling well this morning and baby wasn't moving as much. Went to L&D triage to monitor baby. My baby is doing fine so i explained my symptoms and the nurse said its preeclampsia symptoms but normal blood pressure.  So she took blood to check.  She came back later on as im feeling worse n worse. She said everything thing is normal but im severely anemic and low potassium.  Normal range for anemia is above 11.2. Im at 8.3.Idk what to do. The on call doctor sent me home but the nurse told me she was worried that i could wont get enough iron by the time i deliver because i wouldn't have enough blood. Idk what to do. Do i go somewhere else or talk to my doctor tomorrow or what do i do. The hospital said that i have been low since 28w and it has gotten alot worse n why did my doctor tell me. Please help im scared and feel real bad right now. Im afraid if i go on then it will get worse or that if i deliver now the outcome is going to be bad. I have been anemic before but not this bad. Help please
title: Help please anyone! open to everything
